channel.title: Matter for Michael Arthur
channel.itunes:author: Matter
channel.itunes:summary: These are the audio versions of stories saved in your Matter queue.

item.title: The impact of the Pink Elephant Paradox
item.description: This is called the Pink Elephant Paradox. Learning how to manage obsessive or intrusive thoughts can help you to avoid the associated pitfalls of negative emotions, distractibility, and poor decision-making.
item.content:encoded: This is called the Pink Elephant Paradox. Learning how to manage obsessive or intrusive thoughts can help you to avoid the associated pitfalls of negative emotions, distractibility, and poor decision-making.
item.itunes:author: Matter

item.title: Maker Mind: The Pink Elephant Paradox 🐘
item.description: For most of us, it will only be a few seconds. The phenomenon where the more we try to repress a thought, the more we'll think about it is called the Pink Elephant Paradox.
item.content:encoded: For most of us, it will only be a few seconds. The phenomenon where the more we try to repress a thought, the more we'll think about it is called the Pink Elephant Paradox.
item.itunes:author: Matter

item.title: How to Add Custom Icons and Cover Images to Notion
item.description: As it turns out, you can go a step further and upload custom images and icons to your Notion pages. I just grab a great picture from Unsplash, throw it into Canva and add some text, and upload it to Notion.

item.title: Phil A. McBride: Here's how Canada can help Ukraine fight back, today

item.title: Ukraine War Profiteering and the Shipping Cartel
item.description: Here, for instance, is the largest shipping firm in the world, Maersk, launching its own private boycott of Russia. Russia and Ukraine are significant players in shipping and logistics, not massive, but enough to move the needle.

item.title: Conti Ransomware Group Diaries, Part I: Evasion
item.description: It appears Russian investigators were more interested in going after a top Conti competitor — REvil, an equally ruthless Russian ransomware group that likewise mainly targeted large organizations that could pay large ransom demands.

item.title: AirTags are dangerous - here’s how Apple could fix them
item.description: How AirTags work AirTags aren’t GPS trackers, and they don’t have their own internet connection. Instead, they send out a Bluetooth signal that gets picked up by other Apple gadgets.
item.content:encoded: How AirTags work AirTags aren’t GPS trackers, and they don’t have their own internet connection. Instead, they send out a Bluetooth signal that gets picked up by other Apple gadgets.
item.itunes:author: Matter
